extendedDescription: The Realme Narzo 60 Pro 5G flaunts a 6.7-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate. The device has a stylish design and a vegan leather back panel. The device uses an octa-core Dimensity 7020 SoC which handles all the demanding tasks and gaming with ease. The smartphone features a 100MP primary camera which captures excellent photos. However, the device doesn't feature an ultra-wide camera. Additionally, it doesn't have a microSD card slot, a 3.5mm audio jack, and an IP rating for water and dust resistance. If your priority is display, performance, design, and fast charging support, you can go for the Realme Narzo 60 Pro 5G.

About this item:

Introducing 2-year filter life: Save up to ₹13,500 on total ownership and service costs over 6 years with smart rinse technology that needs no service for 2 years. Actual results may vary based on water input.

10-Stage Purifier: Aqua purification comprises 10 crucial stages, including UV, a copper-charged filter, and providing water enriched with alkaline and essential minerals. US FDA certified 99.99% pure water
2-year unconditional warranty: All filters, membranes, & electrical parts changes covered at zero service cost. Avail warranty in one-click from the Urban Company app

In-tank UV: Enhances water safety with continuous UV light in the tank, eliminating germs, bacteria, and viruses for 24X7 protection against infections providing mineral-enriched, pure, and safe RO water
Native UC free installation is available in these cities: Agra, Ahmedabad, Aurangabad, Bangalore, Bhopal, Bhubaneswar, Chennai, Dehradun, Delhi-NCR, Guntur, Guwahati, Gwalior, Hyderabad, Indore, Jabalpur, Jaipur, Jamshedpur, Kanpur, Karnal, Kochi, Kolkata, Kota, Lucknow, Ludhiana, Madurai, Mumbai, Mysore, Nagpur, Nashik, Patna, Panipat, Prayagraj, Pune, Raipur, Rajahmundry, Ranchi, Surat, Thiruvananthapuram, Vadodara, Varanasi, Vijayawada, Visakhapatnam, and Warangal.

Free installation by Urban Company at your preferred date and time. In high-rise buildings where input pressure exceeds 30 PSI, a pressure-reducing valve will be installed at an additional cost of ~₹250. In low rise building and independent houses where input pressure is below 5 PSI, a Pressure Enhancing Kit will be installed at an additional cost up to ~₹500

Ideal for all water sources: Tanker, borewell, municipal and tap water
8-liter storage: 8 L food-grade tank that keeps the water mineral-enriched and free from harmful chemicals, making it fit for consumption. Suitable for home & office

Box contents: Water Purifier, Pre-filter, installation kit, digital user manual & warranty card

specifications.name: Purification Method:
specifications.value: 10 Stage Purifier - RO+UV boosted with Copper, Minerals & Alkaline

extendedDescription:
About this item:
The curvy and edgy Zeb-Dolphin is an advanced portable wireless mouse that weighs just 75g and fits aptly for everyday use.
The mouse supports dual-mode by giving a seamless wireless connection of 2.4 GHz and Bluetooth v5.0 that can work up to 10m distance without obstruction.
It comes with an advanced optical sensor with 1200 DPI for smooth cursor movements with top-notch precision.
An important component in the mouse is a detachable nano receiver USB attached to the bottom panel. Customers who lose or misplace the dongle easily will find this socket useful.
Ergonomically designed and comfortable to hold, this glossy-finished mouse can be used for long working hours even when it is used on a mouse pad, plain table, or wooden surface.
The three buttons—Right, Left, and scroll—attached to the right thumb side buttons with 1 million cycles can boost your productivity
According to the comfort of the user, the mouse is designed such that its dedicated ON/OFF button can serve as an automatic power saver.
If you are someone who looks out for a pin-drop silence in your workplace, then the Zeb-Dolphin mouse is the one for you. This mouse comes with a silent-operation feature so you can now work without any disturbance.
This mouse has to be operated by a single, durable AA battery, which has to be purchased separately. It comes in two colors—black and white—that can add a classy look to your workspace.
